message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you and my cost. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $105 for your product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial price. I would like to counter with an offer of $107 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product to both of us. I hope you find this proposal more acceptable.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to go up to $106 for your product. I hope this is within your consideration. Thank you for your time.
